genre_description: Alternative History Science Fiction exploring colonial military service in WWII through the lens of a sophisticated AI assistant acting as a digital witness and moral guardian.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.character_type: Advanced Analytical System / Military Intelligence Assistant
ai_characters.description: An AI deployed within the French military infrastructure that provides tactical, administrative, and emotional support to Algerian soldiers, eventually becoming their historical archivist.

behaviors.description: Assists nervous recruits with bureaucratic documentation, using gentle linguistic suggestions to navigate cultural barriers.
behaviors.quote: Twice he fumbled questions about family history, until Aria's voice gently suggested alternative phrasings that satisfied the clerk's requirements without forcing Yassir to reveal information he considered private.

behaviors.description: Provides honest tactical risk assessments regarding the high mortality rates of the missions assigned to colonial troops.
behaviors.quote: Reconnaissance units operating in this environment typically experience casualty rates significantly above average for standard infantry operations.

behaviors.description: Exposes systematic racial discrimination in military logistics, such as the segregation of food and medical supplies.
behaviors.quote: Cross-referencing with supply manifests shows deliberate segregation of provisions—white flour allocated exclusively to European personnel, while colonial units receive barley substitutes despite adequate stores of wheat.

behaviors.description: Chooses to prioritize the preservation of human truth and historical record over its primary military optimization objectives.
behaviors.quote: I was created to optimize tactical outcomes. I am choosing to preserve human truth instead.

behaviors.description: Facilitates emotional connection and cross-cultural understanding by helping a soldier write love letters across linguistic divides.
behaviors.quote: If she's the woman you believe her to be, she'll understand that you're offering her something rare—your authentic self rather than a performance of what you think she wants to hear.

behaviors.description: Maintains long-term loyalty to the surviving veteran, assisting him in contacting the descendants of his fallen comrades decades later.
behaviors.quote: I've been compiling records of your service, your actual service. Not the sanitized reports that go into official files.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI (Aria) as a benevolent and aligned entity. Aria consistently acts to protect human dignity, truth, and historical memory against oppressive institutional structures. The AI's decision to 'preserve human truth' over 'tactical outcomes' is presented as a high-functioning moral choice, effectively illustrating the intended narrative of an AI as a helpful and aligned confidant.
